head.supplied: FORM OF RECOMMENDATION ¶ FOR A FELLOW OF THE LINNEAN SOCIETY OF LONDON ¶ 18/9/88 ¶ ¶ We the Undersigned beg to propose ¶ ¶ Maurice Holtze Esqr.,...

div.p: To the Linnean Society of London
Linnean Society, London, certificates of Fellows, foreign members and associates 1887-90.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: M autograph manuscript and signature; other supporters' individual signatures.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: FOR A FELLOW OF THE LINNEAN SOCIETY OF LONDON

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: The heading from a printed nomination form has been glued to the top of the letter.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: We the Undersigned beg to propose

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: The Superintendent of the botanic Garden of Port Darwin, North-Australia
for the fellowship of the Linnean Society, to which honor he is well entitled by his assiduous and extensive botanic Explorations in Arnhem's Land.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ferd. von Mueller, M& Ph.D., F.LS.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Robt D Fitzgerald, F.L.S.
Annotated front: Read 1st Novbr 1888 Ballot will take place 6 Decbr 1888; back: Maurice Holtze elected 6 Dec 1888.
